mojimod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
mojimod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

mojimod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
mojimod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
mojimod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

mojimod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
mojimod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

mojimod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
mojimod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !mojimod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

mojimod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
mojimod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !mojimod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
